Author: ca333#0118
Content:
@nocturnal as of now you need to use it on a unix based OS (OSX or linux for example) to use it according to the current tutorials/documentations. 

For windows there are some differences in executing the commands, etc. May i ask which OS you are using? We might be able to provide you a custom installer script to offer a smooth starting process.
